aboutUs.title: About
summary: Software Engineer with 4.5+ years of experience delivering enterprise systems in banking, finance, and warehouse management. My work has been mostly frontend and backend focused, building cloud-native microservices, event-driven systems, and secure APIs that process millions of transactions with low latency and high reliability.

During my industry experience, I have significantly worked on the design, development, and management of user-centric, responsive, and scalable front-end applications, ensuring seamless functionality and exceptional user experiences. This has helped me gain substantial exposure to various front-end technologies, including modern JavaScript frameworks and libraries, both in traditional and cloud-native environments. Additionally, I have developed a solid foundation in problem-solving, UI/UX design principles, state management, component-based architecture, web performance optimization, and automating front-end workflows using modern development tools. I enjoy working on challenging projects as they provide ample learning opportunities, contributing to my technical and professional growth, and I aim to continue doing so.
Outside of work, I enjoy photography, watching movies, and exploring the beauty of nature.

keyCompetencies.title: Accountable :
keyCompetencies.description: Proven experience in delivering high-impact results

keyCompetencies.title: Agile and adaptable:
keyCompetencies.description: Can quickly adapt to changing requirements

education.degree: Master of Science (MS) in Computer Science

experience.buttonText: Find CSU journey in this article
experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
Description: Cleveland State University is a public research university in Cleveland, Ohio. As a Software Engineer Intern, I contributed to innovative projects that enhance campus technology and student services. My role involved designing and implementing scalable software solutions to improve user experience and operational efficiency.
Revamped Student Dashboard architecture using React, Remix, and TypeScript, cutting load times by 30% for 5,000+ daily users and streamlining merchant workflows.
Engineered full-stack features using Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and GraphQL, integrating with Remix loaders/actions to enable scalable, SSR-powered admin routing.
Designed and implemented modular, schema-driven UIs with Zod and Prisma, reducing validation errors by 40% and improving form automation.

experience.buttonText: Find Moonraft journey in this article
experience.title: Software Engineer
Description: Moonraft Innovation Labs is a customer experience and innovation firm that combines design, technology, and data to deliver cutting-edge digital solutions. As a member of the Developer team, I contributed to a project for Punjab National Bank, a leading institution in the Banking and Financial Services sector specializing in secure payment processing. My role involved developing a comprehensive end-to-end solution to streamline customer onboarding through both a mobile application and an online web platform.

Led the development of customer-facing web portals for Punjab National Bank (PNC) using React.js and Node.js, enabling 24/7 self- service banking across 3M+ users and reducing branch-based queries by 40%
Integrated Finacle Core Banking APIs with scalable microservices, optimizing transaction workflows and achieving a 30% improvement in API response times under high concurrency.
Developed loan approval engine, making it easy to handle large volumes of data. This helped speed up decision making and boosted processing efficiency by 70%.

experience.buttonText: Find Good Crop journey in this article
experience.title: Software Engineer
Description: Goodcorpit is a comprehensive research and review platform that assists software buyers and service seekers in choosing the best software or service providers. As a Front-End Developer, I worked on two projects. I played a pivotal role in migrating a warehouse management system from IBM AS400 to React.js. The second project involved the development of an animal warehouse management solution.

Modernized legacy AS/400 logistics platform by architecting a full-stack migration to React.js, Redux, Node.js, and MongoDB, delivering a responsive, operator-centric UI/UX that drove $2M in additional product sales post-migration.

Engineered FedEx and USPS API integrations using RESTful services and async job queues, enabling real-time shipment tracking, label generation, and order placement; enhanced UX and system performance led to faster product localization and a measurable drop in shipping errors

Optimized inbound/outbound logistics operations post-migration by implementing barcode scanning, automated routing logic, and dynamic inventory dashboards, reducing manual labor dependency by 40% and increasing throughput via scalable, event-driven architecture
